text:
CHAPTER 11-3
COUNTY  TAX  LEVY
11-3-1
A TAX LEVY FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES
The City of Brandon hereby petitions the board of County Commissioners to include as
part of the taxable valuation the limits of the municipality for the county fire protection
service.
Legislative History:          
Authority:
Ordinance No. 68, 8/7/78,     
SDCL §§ 34-31-1, 34-31-2,
34-31-3.
